import Mathlib

open Filter

/-- If a real sequence is bounded and every convergent subsequence has the same limit `‚Ñì`,
then the whole sequence converges to `‚Ñì`. -/
theorem subseq_unique_limit_imp_seq_tendsto {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {‚Ñì : ‚Ñù}
  (hbounded : ‚àÉ M : ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ n, |x n| ‚â§ M)
  (huniq : ‚àÄ (œÜ : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñï), StrictMono œÜ ‚Üí ‚àÄ y, Tendsto (x ‚àò œÜ) atTop (nhds y) ‚Üí y = ‚Ñì) :
  Tendsto x atTop (nhds ‚Ñì) := by
